attractions.title: Römer
attractions.description: A medieval building in the heart of Frankfurt, serving as the city hall for over 600 years.

attractions.title: Palmengarten
attractions.description: A beautiful botanical garden with a wide variety of plants and themed areas.

attractions.title: Städel Museum
attractions.description: One of Germany's most important art museums, featuring European art from seven centuries.

attractions.title: Main Tower
attractions.description: A prominent skyscraper offering an observation deck with panoramic views of Frankfurt.
attractions.address: Neue Mainzer Str. 52-58, 60311 Frankfurt am Main, Germany

attractions.title: Senckenberg Natural History Museum
attractions.description: One of the largest natural history museums in Germany, known for its extensive dinosaur collection.

dining.title: Apfelwein Wagner
dining.description: A popular spot for traditional German apple wine and hearty local dishes.
dining.address: Schweizer Str. 71, 60594 Frankfurt am Main, Germany

dining.title: Main Tower Restaurant & Lounge
dining.description: A stylish restaurant offering international cuisine with stunning views over the city.
dining.address: Neue Mainzer Str. 52-58, 60311 Frankfurt am Main, Germany

dining.title: Margarete
dining.description: A contemporary restaurant serving modern German cuisine in a stylish setting.

dining.title: Villa Merton
dining.description: An elegant restaurant located in a historic villa, offering creative cuisine with local ingredients.
dining.address: Am Leonhardsbrunn 12, 60322 Frankfurt am Main, Germany

dining.title: Seven Swans
dining.description: A unique dining experience in a narrow skyscraper, serving seasonal and vegetarian dishes.

shoppingAndMerchants.title: Zeil
shoppingAndMerchants.description: Frankfurt's most famous shopping street, home to a wide range of shops, department stores, and boutiques.

shoppingAndMerchants.title: MyZeil
shoppingAndMerchants.description: A modern shopping center with a unique architecture, offering a variety of shops and dining options.

shoppingAndMerchants.title: Kleinmarkthalle
shoppingAndMerchants.description: A bustling indoor market hall offering fresh produce, specialty foods, and international delicacies.

shoppingAndMerchants.title: Goethestraße
shoppingAndMerchants.description: An exclusive shopping street known for luxury brands and designer boutiques.

shoppingAndMerchants.title: Skyline Plaza
shoppingAndMerchants.description: A large shopping mall featuring a wide array of shops, a fitness center, and a rooftop garden.

parks.title: Palmengarten
parks.description: A lush botanical garden showcasing a variety of exotic plants and themed gardens.

parks.title: Grüneburgpark
parks.description: A large public park in the Westend district, perfect for leisurely walks and picnics.

parks.title: Nizza Park
parks.description: A picturesque park along the Main River, known for its Mediterranean plants and riverside views.

parks.title: Ostpark
parks.description: A spacious park with sports facilities, playgrounds, and a serene lake, ideal for outdoor activities.

parks.title: Bethmannpark
parks.description: A small, charming park featuring a Chinese garden, perfect for a peaceful escape in the city.
parks.address: Friedberger Landstraße, 60316 Frankfurt am Main, Germany

parking.title: Parkhaus Hauptbahnhof
parking.description: Parking facility located at Frankfurt's central train station, ideal for travelers.

parking.title: Parkhaus MyZeil
parking.description: Convenient parking located at the MyZeil shopping center in the heart of Frankfurt.

parking.title: Parkhaus Dom Römer
parking.description: Parking garage near the historic Römer building and Frankfurt Cathedral.

parking.title: Parkhaus Oper
parking.description: Parking facility close to the Alte Oper concert hall and the financial district.

parking.title: Parkhaus Westend
parking.description: Parking garage located in the Westend district, close to the Palmengarten.
parking.address: Im Trutz Frankfurt 49, 60322 Frankfurt am Main, Germany

services.title: Frankfurt Health Clinic
services.description: A modern healthcare facility providing a wide range of medical services.

services.title: Frankfurt International School
services.description: An international school offering a comprehensive education for students of all ages.

services.title: Frankfurt City Library
services.description: A large public library with an extensive collection of books and digital resources.

services.title: Frankfurt Tourist Information
services.description: Official visitor center providing maps, brochures, and information about Frankfurt.

services.title: Frankfurt Police Station
services.description: Main police station serving the city of Frankfurt, ensuring public safety and security.

events.title: Frankfurt Book Fair
events.description: The world's largest trade fair for books, attracting publishers, authors, and readers from around the globe.

events.title: Frankfurt Christmas Market
events.description: A festive holiday market with traditional foods, handmade gifts, and seasonal entertainment.

events.title: Luminale
events.description: A light art and technology festival that transforms Frankfurt's buildings and spaces into luminous works of art.
events.address: Various locations, 60329 Frankfurt am Main, Germany

events.title: Museumsuferfest
events.description: An annual festival celebrating art and culture with exhibitions, performances, and food along the Main River.

events.title: Frankfurt Marathon
events.description: An international marathon event attracting runners from all over the world to compete in the heart of Frankfurt.
